scripts.dev: concurrently -n "SERVER,FRONTEND,SHOPEE" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:shopee"
scripts.install:workspaces: npm install --workspace=server && npm install --workspace=bva-frontend && npm install --workspace=shopee-clone
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=server && npm run build --workspace=bva-frontend && npm run build --workspace=shopee-clone
